Mann-Whitney U Test

Null hypothesis (H0): The medians of the differences between two related samples (results from two algorithms) are equal.

Restrictions:

  • Number of algorithms >= 2
  • There must be at least 5 data sets without ties (discrepancies of 0)
References
  • Mann, Henry B., and Donald R. Whitney. "On a test of whether one of two random variables is stochastically larger than the other." The annals of mathematical statistics (1947): 50-60.
